preface.title: Acknowledgments
preface.para: To my wife, the most lovely woman is the world. Thank you so much for what you have done for me. I am sorry that the book took more time than I thought. But now it is over and we can have more time to go out. And I also owe my crying son a lot. There were times you cried to woke me up in the midnight so I could have more time to spend on this book. Thank you a lot, my family!
